column5: Gotta love the speed of the game back then.  Lotta helmets missing  Small goalie gear  Brings back great memories!
That's a bit like watching a Leaf game---you already know the outcome!!  Speed---I think they are a lot faster these days.
Anyone want to bet on the game?  (must be born after 1975 to play)
urghhhh, I'd still rather be watching live NHL right now, I wish they would settle, the weather's crap, the days are short, I love my Leaf games and look forward to them
The only thing I'm starting to miss is the Saturday night game. Back to the table boys.
